page.title: 11PLOCKTON VILLAGE SPORTS.
page.content: {PLOCKTON VILLAGE SPORTS}ARE HELD ON THE{VILLAGE GREEN}EACH YEAR ON A SATURDAY IN JUNE.MOST EVENTS ARE FOR THE{PRIMARY SCHOOL CHILDREN}BUT SOME ARE FOR THE TODDLERS AND TEENAGERS, AND ALSO FOR PARENTS.ALL THE CHILDREN PARADE THROUGH THE VILLAGE BEHIND THE {PIPE BAND.}THERE ARE LOTS OF{STALLS SUCH AS ICE CREAM,POP&CRISPS,TEAS AND HOT DOGS,AND THERE ARE LOTS OF RACES LIKE THE SACK RACE,EGG&SPOON RACE,AND A DRESSING UP RACE.THERE ARE FUN EVENTS LIKE THE PILLOW FIGHT AND TUG-O-WAR AS WELL.THERE ARE{PRIZE {RIBBONS}FOR BEING PLACED AND AT THE END THE POINTS ARE ADDED UP AND A CUP IS PRESENTED TO THE{SPORTS CHAMPION.} EVERYONE LOOKS FORWARD TO THE SPORTS AND A BIG CROWD COMES TO WATCH.THIS YEAR{1985,}IS THE{TENTH ANNIVERSARY} OF THE VILLAGE SPORTS.
